column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The first time I came I had a set menu already set up
column2: but I recently returned and did most of the ordering. The octopus was delicious
column3: as was the shrimp and sausages. The paella was the only thing I didn't love
column4: because it was a seafood paella with not much seafood. Was still great though! I really liked the spinach and manchego stuffed mushrooms.
